name: SEER Primary Tumor

rows:
Localized only

Invasive tumor confined to one of the following subsites:
     Laryngopharynx
     Postcricoid area
     Posterior pharyngeal wall
     Pyriform sinus (pyriform fossa)

Tumor involves adjacent subsite(s) (listed above) WITHOUT fixation##

Localized, NOS

Regional by direct extension only

Any of the subsites above WITH fixation of tumor or fixation, NOS

     Oropharynx
     Prevertebral fascia/muscle(s)
     Soft tissues of neck

     Thyroid gland###***

Fixation of hemilarynx, larynx or oropharynx

Carotid artery (encased) 
Central compartment soft tissues of neck including: 
    Prelaryngeal strap muscles
    Subcutaneous fat

Stated as T3, T4a, or T4 [NOS]
